name: Alien Voxelogy
description:
Introduction

I am a big fan of the Alien franchise and when i spent my hard earned pocket money on a Playstation in 1996 the first game i had was Alien Trilogy. I was hooked since then and so it came to my mind to make a fan remake of that great game.

Development

Except the intro full motion video from the original game, all assets and code has been created by myself. I started development at end of March 2022. Here you can play what i have achieved so far.

Gameplay

You can play the first map of the game. Terminals and doors are triggered by walking against them. You do not need to press any use-key.

Input

  • Move = W, S, A, D
  • Shoot = Left Mouse
  • Grenade = Right Mouse
  • Switch Weapons = Mouse Wheel, Q, E
  • Jump = Space
  • Run = Left Shift

Disclaimer

I made this game only for entertainment and programming education and it is not intended to be sold anywhere. The Alien franchise belongs to 20th Century Studios (The Walt Disney Company).
